headline: Tracking the Evolving Narrative for Standard Chartered After Analyst Price Target Changes
summary: Standard Chartered’s consensus analyst price target has edged up from £14.38 to £14.53, signaling a modest but noteworthy increase in expectations for the bank’s fair value. This shift reflects a blend of analyst outlooks, as recent updates from major brokers have included both upward and downward adjustments based on valuation and execution strength. Stay tuned to find out the best ways to stay informed as the narrative behind Standard Chartered’s stock continues to evolve. What Wall Street...

headline: Is JPMorgan Chase Still a Value Play After Regulatory Updates and 38% Price Surge?
summary: Thinking about making a move with JPMorgan Chase stock? It’s a familiar name, but lately even seasoned investors have been asking if the current price leaves much upside on the table. Over the past year, JPMorgan Chase’s stock has climbed an impressive 38.0%, with a whopping 156.6% gain over three years and 248.9% over five. The year-to-date return sits at 25.2%, even after a modest 4.1% dip over the past 30 days. Those numbers point to a market that’s priced in a significant amount of...

headline: JPMorgan is stuck paying for Charlie Javice's legal fees. The bank says her $115 million bill is 'patently excessive and egregious'
summary: A clause in JPMorgan's contract with Charlie Javice kept the bank on the hook for her legal fees. JPMorgan says it's stuck with an "egregious" bill.

headline: 'Pet Rock' No More: JPMorgan To Accept Bitcoin, Ethereum As Collateral
summary: JPMorgan Chase & Co. (NYSE:JPM) will allow institutional clients to use Bitcoin (CRYPTO: BTC) and Ethereum (CRYPTO: ETH) as collateral for loans, marking a major shift in how Wall Street's largest bank integrates digital assets into its core lending ...
